Inspect layer attribute

Source: R/layer_attributes.R
layer_attribute_inspect.Rd

Inspect layer attribute

layer_attribute_inspect(
  wfs = NULL,
  service = NULL,
  service_version = "2.0.0",
  layer,
  attribute
)

Arguments

wfs

A WFSClient R6 object with methods for interfacing an OGC Web Feature Service.
service

the EMODnet OGC WFS service name. For available services, see emodnet_wfs.
service_version

the WFS service version. Defaults to "2.0.0".
layer

character sting of layer name. To get info on layers, including layer_name use emodnet_get_wfs_info().
attribute

character string, name of layer attribute (variable). Use layer_attributes_get_names() to get layer attribute names.

Value

Detailed summary of individual attribute (variable). Particularly useful for inspecting factor or character variable levels or unique values.

Examples

wfs <- emodnet_init_wfs_client(service = "human_activities")

#> ✔ WFS client created succesfully
#> ℹ Service: 'https://ows.emodnet-humanactivities.eu/wfs'
#> ℹ Version: '2.0.0'
layer_attributes_get_names(wfs, layer = "maritimebnds")

#>  [1] "objectid"   "mblszotpid" "localid"    "sitename"   "legalfound"
#>  [6] "legalfou_1" "country"    "nationalle" "nutscode"   "mblsds_mbl"
#> [11] "shape_leng" "the_geom"  
layer_attribute_inspect(wfs, layer = "maritimebnds", attribute = "sitename")

#>                                                         .   n    percent
#>                                                  Baseline 486 0.46374046
#>                                   Contiguous zone (24 nm)  65 0.06202290
#>                                         Continental Shelf  78 0.07442748
#>                          Delimitation line between states 212 0.20229008
#>                      Exclusive Economic Zone (200 nm) EEZ  68 0.06488550
#>        Exclusive Economic Zone (200 nm) EEZ - Median Line  23 0.02194656
#>  Exclusive Economic Zone (200 nm) EEZ - Overlapping claim  14 0.01335878
#>                                           Internal waters  38 0.03625954
#>                                     Territory sea (12 nm)  64 0.06106870
